chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
None

Goal:
forall f : Formula, freeVarFormula LNN (LNT2LNN_formula f) = freeVarFormula LNT f

Premises:
Formula = fol.Formula LNT : Set
LNT = {| Relations := Datatypes.Empty_set; Functions := LNTFunction; arity := LNTArity |} : Language
LNT2LNN_formula = fix LNT2LNN_formula (f : Formula) : fol.Formula LNN := match f with | @fol.equal _ t1 t2 => fol.equal LNN (LNT2LNN_term t1) (LNT2LNN_term t2) | @atomic _ r _ => match r return (fol.Formula LNN) with end | @fol.impH _ A B => fol.impH LNN (LNT2LNN_formula A) (LNT2LNN_formula B) | @fol.notH _ A => fol.notH LNN (LNT2LNN_formula A) | @fol.forallH _ v A => fol.forallH LNN v (LNT2LNN_formula A) end : Formula -> fol.Formula LNN
freeVarFormula : forall L : Language, fol.Formula L -> list nat
LNN = {| Relations := LNNRelation; Functions := LNTFunction; arity := LNNArity |} : Language
LNT2LNT_formula : forall f : Formula, LNN2LNT_formula (LNT2LNN_formula f) = f
LNN.freeVarLT : forall x y : LNN.Term, freeVarFormula LNN (LNN.LT x y) = freeVarTerm LNN x ++ freeVarTerm LNN y
subFormulaForall : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (x v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), let nv := newVar (v :: freeVarTerm L s ++ freeVarFormula L f) in substituteFormula L (fol.forallH L x f) v s = (if Nat.eq_dec x v then fol.forallH L x f else if in_dec Nat.eq_dec x (freeVarTerm L s) then fol.forallH L nv (substituteFormula L (substituteFormula L f x (fol.var L nv)) v s) else fol.forallH L x (substituteFormula L f v s))
subFormulaExist : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (x v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), let nv := newVar (v :: freeVarTerm L s ++ freeVarFormula L f) in substituteFormula L (fol.existH L x f) v s = (if Nat.eq_dec x v then fol.existH L x f else if in_dec Nat.eq_dec x (freeVarTerm L s) then fol.existH L nv (substituteFormula L (substituteFormula L f x (fol.var L nv)) v s) else fol.existH L x (substituteFormula L f v s))
forallE : forall (T : System) (f : Formula) (v : nat) (t : Term), SysPrf T (forallH v f) -> SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNT f v t)
LNN2LNT_freeVarFormula : forall (f : fol.Formula LNN) (v : nat), In v (freeVarFormula LNT (LNN2LNT_formula f)) < -> In v (freeVarFormula LNN f)
LNN2LNT_freeVarFormula2 : forall (f : fol.Formula LNN) (v : nat), In v (freeVarFormula LNN f) -> In v (freeVarFormula LNT (LNN2LNT_formula f))
LNN2LNT_freeVarFormula1 : forall (f : fol.Formula LNN) (v : nat), In v (freeVarFormula LNT (LNN2LNT_formula f)) -> In v (freeVarFormula LNN f)
LNN.existE : forall (T : LNN.System) (f g : LNN.Formula) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys LNN v T -> ~ In v (freeVarFormula LNN g) -> LNN.SysPrf T (LNN.existH v f) -> LNN.SysPrf T (LNN.impH f g) -> LNN.SysPrf T g
existE : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys LNT v T -> ~ In v (freeVarFormula LNT g) -> SysPrf T (existH v f) -> SysPrf T (impH f g) -> SysPrf T g
LNN2LNT_term = fix LNN2LNT_term (t : fol.Term LNN) : Term := match t with | @fol.var _ v => var v | @apply _ f ts => apply LNT f (LNN2LNT_terms (arity LNN (inr f)) ts) end with LNN2LNT_terms (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms LNN n) {struct ts} : Terms n := match ts in (fol.Terms _ n0) return (Terms n0) with | @Tnil _ => Tnil LNT | @Tcons _ m s ss => Tcons LNT m (LNN2LNT_term s) (LNN2LNT_terms m ss) end for LNN2LNT_term : fol.Term LNN -> Term
LNN2LNT_freeVarTerms : forall (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms LNN n), freeVarTerms LNT n (LNN2LNT_terms n ts) = freeVarTerms LNN n ts
LNT2LNN_freeVarTerm : forall t : Term, freeVarTerm LNN (LNT2LNN_term t) = freeVarTerm LNT t
LNT2LNN_term = fix LNT2LNN_term (t : Term) : fol.Term LNN := match t with | @fol.var _ v => fol.var LNN v | @apply _ f ts => apply LNN f (LNT2LNN_terms (arity LNT (inr f)) ts) end with LNT2LNN_terms (n : nat) (ts : Terms n) {struct ts} : fol.Terms LNN n := match ts in (fol.Terms _ n0) return (fol.Terms LNN n0) with | @Tnil _ => Tnil LNN | @Tcons _ m s ss => Tcons LNN m (LNT2LNN_term s) (LNT2LNN_terms m ss) end for LNT2LNN_term : Term -> fol.Term LNN
LNN2LNT_freeVarTerm : forall t : fol.Term LNN, freeVarTerm LNT (LNN2LNT_term t) = freeVarTerm LNN t
In_freeVarListFormulaE : forall (L : Language) (v : nat) (F : fol.Formulas L), In v (freeVarListFormula L F) -> exists f : fol.Formula L, In v (freeVarFormula L f) /\ In f F
subAllFormula_ext : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (m1 m2 : nat -> fol.Term L), (forall m : nat, In m (freeVarFormula L f) -> m1 m = m2 m) -> subAllFormula L f m1 = subAllFormula L f m2
folLogic.impRefl : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f : fol.Formula L), folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L f f)
subFormulaNot : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), substituteFormula L (fol.notH L f) v s = fol.notH L (substituteFormula L f v s)
subFormulaId : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat), substituteFormula L f v (fol.var L v) = f
folLogic.forallSimp : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat), folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.forallH L v f) -> folProof.SysPrf L T f
subAllFormulaId : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f : fol.Formula L), folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L (subAllFormula L f (fun x : nat => fol.var L x)) f)
Formula_depth_rec2_forall : forall (L : Language) (Q P : fol.Formula L -> Set) (f1 : forall t t0 : fol.Term L, Q (fol.equal L t t0) -> P (fol.equal L t t0)) (f2 : forall (r : Relations L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r))), Q (atomic L r t) -> P (atomic L r t)) (f3 : forall f : fol.Formula L, (Q f -> P f) -> forall f0 : fol.Formula L, (Q f0 -> P f0) -> Q (fol.impH L f f0) -> P (fol.impH L f f0)), (forall (f g : fol.Formula L) (z1 z2 : Q f -> P f), (forall q : Q f, z1 q = z2 q) -> forall z3 z4 : Q g -> P g, (forall q : Q g, z...
folLogic.iffE2 : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L), folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L f g) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L g f)
freeVarSubFormula4 : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarFormula L (substituteFormula L f v s)) -> ~ In v (freeVarFormula L f) -> In x (freeVarFormula L f)
subFormulaDepth : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), depth L (substituteFormula L f v s) = depth L f
folLogic.impI : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L), folProof.SysPrf L (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula L) T g) f -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L g f)
folLogic.impE : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L), folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L g f) -> folProof.SysPrf L T g -> folProof.SysPrf L T f
sysWeaken : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T f -> SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNT) T g) f
folLogic.forallI : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys L v T -> folProof.SysPrf L T f -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.forallH L v f)
